meta.title: Web3 Incubation Program by Sony Network Communications and Astar Network
meta.description: This is a joint program between Sony Network Communications and Astar, and aims to foster cutting-edge Web3 use cases using the knowledge and resources of SONY and Astar.

program.title: Program
program.description: Provide large scale and comprehensive support for Web3 builders

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Provide all the support necessary for web3 companies to grow

mentors.title: Mentors
mentors.description: Providing constructive advice and feedback by utilizing their technical and financial knowledge
